com.konakart.appif
Interface FetchTagGroupOptionsIf

All Known Implementing Classes:
FetchTagGroupOptions
public interface FetchTagGroupOptionsIf

An object used to define options used when reading tag groups from the database

Method Summary
 boolean isGetProductCount()
          If true, the Tag objects are populated with the number of products

Method Detail

isPopulateTags

boolean isPopulateTags()
If true we populate the tag groups with tags. When using Solr for faceted searching, this can be set to false since the tags aren't required

Returns:
the populateTags

setPopulateTags

void setPopulateTags(boolean populateTags)
If true we populate the tag groups with tags. When using Solr for faceted searching, this can be set to false since the tags aren't required

Parameters:
populateTags - the populateTags to set
